languages.text: {n}Соломон дожидается конца слов кормчего и невозмутимо обращается к вам:{/n} "Этот человек находится в розыске, Вольный Торговец. Он обвиняется в подрыве перевозок {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}священной десятины{/g}, контрабанде, похищении подданных Империума и подкупе должностных лиц. Не будь мы на вашем флагмане, я бы казнил еретика на месте, но здесь — вы власть, и вы — суд".

traits.locale_text: {n}Соломон дожидается конца слов кормчего и невозмутимо обращается к вам:{/n} "Этот человек находится в розыске, Вольный Торговец. Он обвиняется в подрыве перевозок {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}священной десятины{/g}, контрабанде, похищении подданных Империума и подкупе должностных лиц. Не будь мы на вашем флагмане, я бы казнил еретика на месте, но здесь — вы власть, и вы — суд".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон дожидается конца слов кормчего и невозмутимо обращается к вам:{/n} "Этот человек находится в розыске, Вольный Торговец. Не будь мы на вашем флагмане, я бы казнил еретика на месте, но здесь — вы власть, и вы — суд".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはマスター・ヘルムスマンの話が終わるのを見届けると、冷ややかにあなたへと向き直った。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、そのクルーは指名手配中の身です。{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}聖なる租税{/g}の輸送を妨害し、密輸を行い、帝国臣民の誘拐、さらには役人への賄賂まで、数々の罪に問われています。ここがあなたの旗艦でなければ、その場で異端者として処刑していました。だが今この場では、あなたが権威であり、あなたが法廷です」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはマスター・ヘルムスマンの話が終わるのを見届けると、冷ややかにあなたへと向き直った。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、そのクルーは指名手配中の身です。聖なる租税の輸送を妨害し、密輸を行い、帝国臣民の誘拐、さらには役人への賄賂まで、数々の罪に問われています。ここがあなたの旗艦でなければ、その場で異端者として処刑していました。だが今この場では、あなたが権威であり、あなたが法廷です」
{n}ソロモーンはマスター・ヘルムスマンの話が終わるのを見届けると、冷ややかにあなたへと向き直った。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、そのクルーは指名手配中の身です。聖なる租税の輸送を妨害し、密輸を行い、帝国臣民の誘拐、さらには役人への賄賂まで、数々の罪に問われています。ここがあなたの旗艦でなければ、その場で異端者として処刑していました。だが今この場では、あなたが権威であり、あなたが法廷です」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, Başserdümen'in sözlerini bitirmesini bekleyip sakince sana dönüyor.{/n} "Mevzubahis tayfa, aranan bir adam Hür Tacir. Kendisi; {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}kutsal aşar{/g} sevkiyatlarına engel olmak, kaçakçılık yapmak, İmparatorluk'un tebaasını kaçırmak ve yetkililere rüşvet vermekle suçlanıyor. Sancak geminizde olmasaydık bu kâfiri gördüğüm yerde idam ederdim ancak burada otorite de yargı da sizsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, Başserdümen'in sözlerini bitirmesini bekler ve sakince sana döner.{/n} "Mevzubahis tayfa, aranan bir adamdır Hür Tacir. Kendisi kutsal aşar sevkiyatlarına engel olmak, kaçakçılık yapmak, İmparatorluk'un tebaasını kaçırmak ve yetkililere rüşvet vermekle suçlanmaktadır. Sancak geminizde olmasaydık bu kâfiri gördüğüm yerde idam ederdim ancak burada otorite de yargı da sizsiniz."

{n}Solomorne, Başserdümen'in sözlerini bitirmesini bekler ve sakince sana döner.{/n} "Mevzubahis tayfa, aranan bir adamdır Hür Tacir. Kendisi kutsal aşar sevkiyatlarına engel olmak, kaçakçılık yapmak, İmparatorluk'un tebaasını kaçırmak ve yetkililere rüşvet vermekle suçlanmaktadır. Sancak geminizde olmasaydık bu kâfiri gördüğüm yerde idam ederdim ancak burada otorite de yargı da sizsiniz."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne espera a que el maestro timonel termine de hablar y, con frialdad, se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Su tripulante, Comerciante Independiente, es un hombre buscado. Se le acusa de interferir en los {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sagrados envíos del diezmo{/g}, de contrabando, de secuestrar súbditos del Imperium y de sobornar a funcionarios. Si no estuviéramos en su nave insignia, habría ejecutado a este hereje en el acto, pero aquí es usted la autoridad y el tribunal».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne espera a que el maestro timonel termine de hablar y, con frialdad, se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Su tripulante, Comerciante Independiente, es un hombre buscado. Se le acusa de interferir en los sagrados envíos del diezmo, de contrabando, de secuestrar súbditos del Imperium y de sobornar a funcionarios. Si no estuviéramos en su nave insignia, habría ejecutado a este hereje en el acto, pero aquí es usted la autoridad y el tribunal».

{n}Solomorne espera a que el maestro timonel termine de hablar y, con frialdad, se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Su tripulante, Comerciante Independiente, es un hombre buscado. Se le acusa de interferir en los sagrados envíos del diezmo, de contrabando, de secuestrar súbditos del Imperium y de sobornar a funcionarios. Si no estuviéramos en su nave insignia, habría ejecutado a este hereje en el acto, pero aquí es usted la autoridad y el tribunal».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙等待雷沃说完之后，冷静地转向了你。{/n}“他说的这个手下是个通缉犯，行商浪人。他的罪名包括：破坏{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}神圣什一税{/g}的运输工作、走私、绑架帝国臣民、贿赂官员。如果这里不是你的旗舰，我恐怕早就把那个异端分子当场处决了。不过在这里，你才是权威，你就是法庭本身。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙等待雷沃说完之后，冷静地转向了你。{/n}“他说的这个手下是个通缉犯，行商浪人。他的罪名包括：破坏神圣什一税的运输工作、走私、绑架帝国臣民、贿赂官员。如果这里不是你的旗舰，我恐怕早就把那个异端分子当场处决了。不过在这里，你才是权威，你就是法庭本身。”
{n}索罗蒙等待雷沃说完之后，冷静地转向了你。{/n}“他说的这个手下是个通缉犯，行商浪人。他的罪名包括：破坏神圣什一税的运输工作、走私、绑架帝国臣民、贿赂官员。如果这里不是你的旗舰，我恐怕早就把那个异端分子当场处决了。不过在这里，你才是权威，你就是法庭本身。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne attend calmement que le maître timonier termine sa diatribe avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Cet homme est recherché par les autorités, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Il est accusé de détournement de cargaisons de la {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme sacrée{/g}, de contrebande, de prise d'otages sur des membres de l'Imperium et de corruption d'officiels. J'aurais immédiatement exécuté cet hérétique si nous ne nous trouvions pas à bord de votre vaisseau amiral. La décision vous revient donc. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne attend calmement que le maître timonier termine sa diatribe avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Cet homme est recherché par les autorités, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Il est accusé de détournement de cargaisons de la dîme sacrée, de contrebande, de prise d'otages sur des membres de l'Imperium et de corruption d'officiels. J'aurais immédiatement exécuté cet hérétique si nous ne nous trouvions pas à bord de votre vaisseau amiral. La décision vous revient donc. »

{n}Solomorne attend calmement que le maître timonier termine sa diatribe avant de se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Cet homme est recherché par les autorités, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Il est accusé de détournement de cargaisons de la dîme sacrée, de contrebande, de prise d'otages sur des membres de l'Imperium et de corruption d'officiels. J'aurais immédiatement exécuté cet hérétique si nous ne nous trouvions pas à bord de votre vaisseau amiral. La décision vous revient donc. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wartet, bis der Hauptsteuermann fertig ist und wendet sich dann entspannt dir zu.{/n} "Der Mann wird steckbrieflich gesucht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Er hat Zahlungen des {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}heiligen Zehnts{/g} unterschlagen, Waren geschmuggelt, Untertanen des Imperiums entführt und Beamte bestochen. Wären wir nicht auf Eurem Flaggschiff, hätte ich den Ketzer auf der Stelle exekutiert, aber hier gilt allein Eure Gerichtsbarkeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne waits for the end of the Master Helmsman's words and coolly turns to you.{/n} "His crewman is a wanted man, Rogue Trader. He is accused of subverting {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} shipments, smuggling, kidnapping the Imperium's subjects, and bribing officials. Were we not on your flagship, I would have executed the heretic on the spot, but here, you are the authority, and you are the court."
